channel.title: Infrastructure as Code (IaC) on Learn with AI
channel.description: Recent content in Infrastructure as Code (IaC) on Learn with AI

item.title: Terraform
item.description: Preview User ask: give me five question about Terraform ChatGPT answer: What is Terraform and what does it do? How does Terraform differ from other infrastructure as code tools? How does Terraform manage state? How do you use Terraform to provision infrastructure across multiple cloud providers? Can Terraform be used for managing on-premises infrastructure? If so, how? Explain User ask: Explain Terraform and give an example ChatGPT answer: Terraform is an open-source infrastructure as code (IaC) tool that enables users to manage cloud infrastructure in a declarative way.
